dynamic.diagonal: diagonal composition with dynamic lines(动态.对角：对角线构图，动态线条)
dynamic.leading: leading lines composition drawing focus to figure(动态.引导：引导线构图突出人物)
dynamic.scurve: s-curve composition for elegant flow(动态.S曲线：S曲线构图，优雅流动感)
dynamic.triangle: triangular composition with stable base(动态.三角：三角形构图，稳定基础)
advanced.frame: frame-within-frame composition using environment(高级.框架：环境框架式构图)
advanced.asymmetry: balanced asymmetrical composition with weighted elements(高级.不对称：平衡的不对称构图，元素权重分配)
advanced.layered: layered composition with foreground, middle, and background(高级.层次：前中后景分层构图)
advanced.radial: radial composition with central focus point(高级.放射：以中心焦点的放射状构图)

view.default: full-body view from medium distance, figure at 70% frame height(中等距离全身视角，人物占画面70%高度)
choices: none(无)
standard.full: full-body view from medium distance, figure at 70% frame height(标准.全身：中等距离全身视角，人物占画面70%高度)
standard.wide: wide establishing view showing full environment(标准.广角：展示完整环境的广角视角)
standard.balanced: medium-wide view balancing figure and environment(标准.平衡：平衡人物与环境的中广角视角)
intimate.close: close full-body view with minimal environment(私密.近景：最少环境的近距离全身视角)
intimate.personal: intimate full-body view from close distance(私密.个人：近距离私密全身视角)
intimate.detail: close-up view emphasizing details(私密.细节：强调细节的特写视角)
dramatic.compressed: compressed view with telephoto perspective(戏剧.压缩：长焦压缩效果的视角)
dramatic.wide: wide-angle view with dramatic perspective(戏剧.广角：戏剧性透视的广角视角)
dramatic.low: full-body shot from low position with figure at 60% frame height(戏剧.低位：低位全身拍摄，人物占画面60%)
environmental.expansive: expansive view with environmental context(环境.开阔：带环境背景的开阔视角)
environmental.scale: pulled-back view showing scale relationship(环境.比例：展示比例关系的远视角)
environmental.context: wide view emphasizing environmental storytelling(环境.情境：强调环境叙事的广角视角)

angle.default: eye-level angle from a comfortable distance(舒适距离的平视角度)
choices: none(无)
eye.standard: eye-level angle from a comfortable distance(平视.标准：舒适距离的平视角度)
eye.dutch: eye-level dutch angle from medium distance(平视.倾斜：中等距离的倾斜平视角度)
eye.natural: natural eye-level from slight distance(平视.自然：略远处的自然平视)
high.slight: slightly elevated angle showing more environment(高角.略高：略微高角度以显示更多环境)
high.overhead: high angle shot with environmental context(高角.俯视：带环境背景的高角度拍摄)
high.birds: bird's eye view showing full scene(高角.鸟瞰：显示完整场景的鸟瞰视角)
low.slight: slight low angle emphasizing environment(低角.略低：强调环境的略低角度)
low.dramatic: dramatic low angle from knee height(低角.戏剧：膝盖高度的戏剧性仰角)
low.heroic: heroic low angle from waist level(低角.英雄：腰部高度的英雄式仰角)
creative.ground: upward angle from ground level(创意.地面：地平面仰角)
creative.dynamic: dynamic upward angle emphasizing height(创意.动态：强调高度的动态仰角)
creative.tilted: low angle with slight tilt for dramatic effect(创意.倾斜：带轻微倾斜的低角度以增加戏剧效果)

focus.default: deep focus with sharp details from foreground to background(前景到背景都清晰的深焦)
choices: none(无)
deep.standard: deep focus with sharp details from foreground to background(深焦.标准：前景到背景都清晰的深焦)
deep.ultra: ultra sharp focus throughout entire frame(深焦.超清：整个画面超清晰对焦)
deep.cinematic: cinematic deep focus with crystal clear environment(深焦.电影：电影感深焦，环境清晰可见)
technical.balanced: balanced focus with crisp details in all planes(技术.平衡：所有层面都清晰细节的平衡对焦)
technical.maximum: maximum depth of field with sharp environmental details(技术.最大：最大景深，环境细节清晰)
technical.uniform: technical focus with uniform sharpness(技术.统一：技术性对焦，统一锐度)
specialty.architectural: architectural focus with precise environmental details(专业.建筑：建筑摄影式对焦，环境细节精准)
specialty.landscape: landscape focus emphasizing scenic clarity(专业.风光：风光摄影对焦，强调场景清晰度)
specialty.documentary: documentary style focus with full scene clarity(专业.纪实：纪实风格对焦，全场景清晰)
